channel.title: Downloading peoples servers problem
channel.description:
[b]my problem is when i download some1s server i cannot get the server to run i go into "runserver" it says it has a problem[/b]...... [u][b]red then the window closes[/u]
if some1s feeling in a [s]giving mode i[/s] would like if u could give me the link to a fully working server :) ;D
thanks!

item.title: Downloading peoples servers problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Download JDK 6 and use my tutorial to fix the compiler. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,111589.0.html…

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading peoples servers problem
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

ok first of all you might have the rong JDK so go to my tut explaining how to get the right one here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,112632.0.html and second you might hav a messed up runserver.bat so just go into your source (server as you like to call it) and look for your runserver then right click it and put edit not open! edit! then replace everything you have in there with this

@echo off title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE server set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

note: were it says your server name here in capital letters change that to what your server name is in miniscual letters

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading peoples servers problem
item.dc:creator: @BaracudaX BaracudaX
item.description:
@BaracudaX wrote:

its not called a server its a sorce and it is for your only personal server not anybody elses

to log in to other peoples server u use the moparscape client or webclient

you must have java also

ps: im am currently on a scholl ocmputer so i canmt give you a code to make your compile work but check lothy’s tut list under “mod tharock”. i think he has a tut on "the perfect compiler

Read full topic
